text: Evelyn Shulman Lear (January 8, 1926 â€” July 1, 2012) was an American opera singer. She sang soprano. She trained at the Julliard School of Music and in Berlin.Harris M. Lentz, Obituaries in the Performing Arts, 2012 (Jefferson, NC: McFarland & Company, 2013), p. 166 She was active mainly from the late 1950s to the middle of 1992. She received a Grammy Award in 1966. She also appeared in several movies. Lear was born in Brooklyn, New York City.
